pipeline_output:

This problem severely impacts user trust and functionality, as tasks are vital for productivity. A robust data synchronization feature is required to ensure that tasks remain consistent and intact across all devices after syncing. The new feature should include error handling and provide user notifications if any issues arise during the sync process.  
- **Priority:** Critical

input_text: App crashes randomly lol. Using Pixel 7, Android 14. Happens when editing tasks.
pipeline_output:
**Ticket Title:** App Crash During Task Editing on Pixel 7

**Ticket Description:** The application experiences random crashes during the task editing process specifically on the Pixel 7 device running Android 14. Users encounter this issue after following these steps: 1. Open the app. 2. Navigate to the task editing section. 3. Edit a task. The app crashes without warning during the editing process, significantly disrupting user experience and preventing effective task management. This bug is critical and needs immediate attention to ensure a stable and reliable editing functionality for users.

**Priority:** Critical

**Category:** Bug

**Confidence:** 0.95

input_text: Please add recurring tasks feature. Very important for productivity.
pipeline_output:
**Ticket Title:** Add Recurring Tasks Feature for Enhanced Productivity  

**Ticket Description:**  
We propose the addition of a recurring tasks feature within our task management system. This feature will allow users to create tasks that automatically repeat on a specified schedule (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.). The implementation of this feature is intended to streamline task management, enabling users to manage their tasks more efficiently and ultimately improving their overall productivity. Currently, users must manually create recurring tasks, which is time-consuming and inefficient. By addressing this need, we can significantly enhance the user experience and reduce the workload for our users.

**Priority:** High  

**Category:** Feature Request  

**Confidence:** 0.95
ticket_title: Add Recurring Tasks Feature for Enhanced Productivity
